plot: AC-12's loyalties are divided when DS Arnott comes under scrutiny from his colleagues.

Commended for bravery Cottan continues to suggest to Gill and Kate that the rogue officer suppressing information from the sex abuse case and its link to the deaths of Danny and Lindsay's informant is Steve - who is suspended from duty. Teaming up with Lindsay he tries to discover the reason for Danny's death but their partnership is brought to an abrupt end. Fairbank is also brought in, regarding the murder of the whistle blower at the care home where the abuse was investigated and, whilst he is released for lack of evidence, Joe seems to know better.—don @ minifie-1
